net.adamcin.oakpal.webster

Class ChecklistExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.webster.ChecklistExporter

  • public final class ChecklistExporter
extends Object
    Exports namespaces, node types, and ForcedRoots from a JCR session to assist with project checklist management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ChecklistExporter.Builder
      Builder for a ChecklistExporter, which is otherwise immutable.

      Function type that provides a Writer.

    • Method Detail

      • updateChecklist

        public void updateChecklist(ChecklistExporter.WriterOpener writerOpener,
                            javax.jcr.Session session,
                            net.adamcin.oakpal.core.Checklist checklist,
                            ChecklistExporter.ForcedRootUpdatePolicy updatePolicy)
                     throws IOException,
                            javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Update a checklist (or start a new one) with the forced roots exported from the provided session. Tidied JSON output will be written to the provided writer.
        Parameters:
        writerOpener - an opener that provides the writer to write the JSON output to
        session - the JCR session to export roots from
        checklist - the checklist to update, or null to start from scratch
        updatePolicy - specify behavior for retaining existing forced roots
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs when writing the checklist
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if an error occurs when exporting the new forced roots

      • findRoots

        public List<net.adamcin.oakpal.core.ForcedRoot> findRoots(javax.jcr.Session session)
                                                   throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Perform all retrieval operations against the provided session.
        Parameters:
        session - the session to retrieve nodes from
        Returns:
        the result list of ForcedRoots
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if an error occurs
